Token.Abstract: Instances of RKInMemoryEntityCache provide an in-memory caching mechanism for objects in a Core Data managed object context. Managed objects can be cached by attribute for fast retrieval without repeatedly hitting the Core Data persistent store. This can provide a substantial speed advantage over issuing fetch requests in cases where repeated look-ups of the same data are performed using a small set of attributes as the query key. Internally, the cache entries are maintained as references to the NSManagedObjectID of corresponding cached objects.
Initializes the receiver with a managed object context containing the entity instances to be cached.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context containing objects to be cached.

Token.Abstract: The managed object context with which the receiver is associated.
The managed object context with which the receiver is associated.
Caches all instances of an entity using the value for an attribute as the cache key.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to cache all instances of.

Parameter.Name: attributeName
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to cache the instances by.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating if all instances of an entity have been cached by a given attribute name.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to check the cache status of.

Parameter.Name: attributeName
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to check the cache status with.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the cache has been loaded with instances with the given attribute, else NO.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the first cached instance of a given entity where the specified attribute matches the given value.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to search the cache for instances of.

Parameter.Name: attributeName
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to search the cache for matches with.

Parameter.Name: attributeValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value of the attribute to return a match for.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object from which to retrieve the cached results.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A matching managed object instance or nil. @raise NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if instances of the entity and attribute have not been cached.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all cached instances of a given entity where the specified attribute matches the given value.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to search the cache for instances of.

Parameter.Name: attributeName
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to search the cache for matches with.

Parameter.Name: attributeValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value of the attribute to return a match for.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object from which to retrieve the cached results.

ReturnValue.Abstract: All matching managed object instances or nil. @raise NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if instances of the entity and attribute have not been cached.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the underlying entity attribute cache for a given entity and attribute.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to retrieve the entity attribute cache object for.

Parameter.Name: attributeName
Parameter.Abstract: The attribute to retrieve the entity attribute cache object for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The entity attribute cache for the given entity and attribute, or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all entity attributes caches for a given entity.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to retrieve the collection of entity attribute caches for.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of entity attribute cache objects for the given entity or an empty array if none were found.

Token.Abstract: Flushes the entity cache by sending a flush message to each entity attribute cache contained within the receiver.
Adds a given object to all entity attribute caches for the object's entity contained within the receiver.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to add to the appropriate entity attribute caches.

Token.Abstract: Removed a given object from all entity attribute caches for the object's entity contained within the receiver.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to remove from the appropriate entity attribute caches.
